name: course-selling-website
description: - Initialise a new Node.js Project - Add express, mongoose, jsonwebtoken to it as a dependency - Create index.js - Add route skeleton for user login, signup, purchase a course, sees all courses, sees the purchased courses - Add routes for admin login, admin signup, create a course, delete a course, add course content - Add middlewares for user and admin auth - Add a database (mongodb). use dotenv to store the database connection string - Define the schema for User, Admin, Course, Purchase - Complete the routes for user login, signup, purchase a course, see course (Can use express routing to better structure the routes) - Create the frontend
